channel.title: I need help - port forewarding
channel.description:
guys i need help port forewarding.
i went to....
my router>advancend setup>NAT> then it said special application and virtual server so i clicked virtual server.
now it says.....
mapping ports | Server IP | Enabled
and in special app it says.....
Trigger port | Trigger Type | Public Port | Public Type | Enabled
which should i fill in to port foreward and what should i put in it...?
i cannot find "gaming" or "port forewarding" on my router but this is all thats in my NAT section
